org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.request

Class CreateDiffuserRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.request.CreateDiffuserRequest

  • public class CreateDiffuserRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A request containing the information needed by the RestfulDiffuserServer to create a new RestfulDiffuser. This method contains all the information needed to construct the DiffuserSignature, and create the strategy with its end-points.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateDiffuserRequest

        public CreateDiffuserRequest(java.lang.String returnTypeClassName,
                     java.lang.String className,
                     java.lang.String methodName,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> argumentTypes,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> classPaths,
                     java.lang.String serializerType,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientEndpoints)
        Constructs the request to create a diffuser based on the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        returnTypeClassName - The fully qualified class name of the return type
        className - The fully qualified class name of the class containing the specified method
        methodName - The name of the method, in the specified Class, to be called
        argumentTypes - The type of each argument accepted by the specified method. The types must be in the same order as in the method signature.
        classPaths - The list of class paths
        serializerType - The name of the serializer. See SerializerFactory.SerializerType for a list of serializer names. The serializers are instantiated using the SerializerFactory.
        clientEndpoints - The list of end-point URI to which run/execution is diffused.

      • CreateDiffuserRequest

        public CreateDiffuserRequest(java.lang.String className,
                     java.lang.String methodName,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> argumentTypes,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> classPaths,
                     java.lang.String serializerType,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientEndpoints)
        Constructs the request to create a diffuser based on the specified parameters. Sets the return type to be void using void.class.getName().
        Parameters:
        className - The fully qualified class name of the class containing the specified method
        methodName - The name of the method, in the specified Class, to be called
        argumentTypes - The type of each argument accepted by the specified method. The types must be in the same order as in the method signature.
        classPaths - The list of class paths
        serializerType - The name of the serializer. See SerializerFactory.SerializerType for a list of serializer names. The serializers are instantiated using the SerializerFactory.
        clientEndpoints - The list of end-point URI to which run/execution is diffused.

      • CreateDiffuserRequest

        public CreateDiffuserRequest()
        Creates a default request to create a diffuser. The name of the containing class, the method name are set to empty strings, the argument types, class paths, serializer type, and client end-points are set to null.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static CreateDiffuserRequest create(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classPaths,
                           java.lang.String className,
                           java.lang.String methodName,
                           java.lang.String returnTypeClassName,
                           java.lang.String... argumentTypes)
        Creates a request to create a diffuser that acts on the specified method of the class name, and has the specified argument types.
        Parameters:
        classPaths - A list of URI (represented as strings) used to load classes remotely.
        className - The name of class containing the method that is diffused by this diffuser.
        methodName - The name of the method to diffuse
        returnTypeClassName - The fully qualified class name representing the return type
        argumentTypes - The fully qualified class names of the method's parameters
        Returns:
        a request to create a diffuser that acts on the specified method of the class name, and has the specified argument types.

      • getClientEndpoints

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getClientEndpoints()
        Returns:
        A list of addresses to which the RestfulDiffuser will send methods to be executed. Note that these end-points are handed to the DiffuserStrategy, which will hand the Diffuser end-points when requested.

      • getClientEndpointsUri

        public java.util.List<java.net.URI> getClientEndpointsUri()
        Returns:
        A list of URI to which the RestfulDiffuser will send methods to be executed. Note that these end-points are handed to the DiffuserStrategy, which will hand the Diffuser end-points when requested.
